column6: It's more mayhem, carnage, and destruction than you can shake a decapitated head at! The fate of what's left of the human race hangs in the balance as the Civil War between the Marvel Zombies escalates to epic levels!
column8: | colorist:June Chung | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Sean Phillips | penciller (cover):Arthur Suydam | letterer:Rus Wooton
